client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

user_token.title: UserToken
user_token.description: The user token associated with the User data is being requested for.

items.title: ItemId
items.description: The `item_id` of the Item associated with this webhook, warning, or error

item_ids.description: An array of `item_id`s associated with the User to be reset.  If empty or `null`, this field will default to resetting all Items associated with the User.
